#Library
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

## A.Data Loading dan Preprocessing
# 1. Load Dataset
```{r}
# CP = Calon Pendaftar
CP = read.csv('profiling.csv')
CP = separate(CP, "ID.NAMA.JENIS_KEL.USIA.Ranking_Uni_Asal.IPK.RISET", into = c("ID", "Name", "Gender", "Age", "Ranking", "IPK", "RISET"), sep = ";")
CP
str(CP)

# HK = Hasil Kelulusan
HK = read.csv('admisi.csv')
HK = separate(HK, "ID.GRE.TOEFL.MOT_LETTER.REKOM_LETTER.LULUS", into = c("ID", "GRE", "TOEFL", "MOT_LETTER", "REKOM_LETTER", "LULUS"), sep = ";")
HK
str(HK)
```

# 2. Check missing value, duplicate, outlier
```{r}
anyNA(CP)
anyNA(HK)

anyDuplicated(CP)
anyDuplicated(HK)

#Clearing data of CP$Age, LO = Lower Outlier, UO = Upper Outlier
n = 500

CP$Age = as.numeric(CP$Age)
IQRAge = IQR(CP$Age)
Q1Age = CP$Age[n / 2]
Q3Age = CP$Age[n / 4*3]
AgeLO = Q1Age - 1.5 * IQRAge
AgeUO = Q3Age + 1.5 * IQRAge
AgeLO
AgeUO

CP$IPK = as.numeric(CP$IPK)


```

# 3. Merge dataset 
```{r}
Data = merge(CP, HK, by = "ID")
```
